titleStmt.title: A Letter from the Arch-Bishops and Bishops to the King's most excellent majesty

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson,

notesStmt.note: Copy imperfect: pages torn with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
With: His Majesties most gracious answer to the letter from the Arch-Bishops and Bishops.
